channel.title: about me on Andrew Schllenberg
channel.description: Recent content in about me on Andrew Schllenberg

item.title: Hello!
item.description: Thank you for checking out my website. I am a C++ and Python developer doing applied research in robotics. How computers interact, observe, and represent the physical world fascinates me. My work intersects with machine vision, computational geometry, controls, and more. There exists a near-infinite number of programming blogs. Hopefully, these ideas will inspire others working at the intersection of robotics and computer vision. It is not my intent to add noise or repeat hello world examples.
